players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Charlie's death is a huge blow to our team. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
Diana: "Bob is acting suspiciously, I think he might be the mafioso."
Bob: "I'm investigating Diana and I have reason to believe they are the mafioso. We should lynch them."
You: "Bob, I don't think you're doing a good job of investigating. You seem to be jumping to conclusions and not considering all the evidence."
